content.query:
Use ServerlessPool
GO
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD='09December@2022'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL newCredential1
WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET='sv=2021-06-08&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2022-12-09T19:21:04Z&st=2022-12-09T11:21:04Z&spr=https&sig=gXd%2BBDMQ8oTxFteMWuAVyP6VQssJhLsmcAIhR6nYmsM%3D'
GO;

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE datasourceADL2 with(
    LOCATION='https://dldemoaccount.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL=newCredential1
);
----create external file format-------------------
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csvFile
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
      FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
      STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
      FIRST_ROW = 2,
      USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,
      ENCODING = 'UTF8' )
);

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE employeeExternalTable2 (
   EMPLOYEE_ID INT  NULL,
   FIRST_NAME VARCHAR(15) NULL,
   LAST_NAME VARCHAR(15) NULL,
   EMAIL VARCHAR(20) NULL,
   PHONE_NUMBER VARCHAR(20) NULL,
   HIRE_DATE VARCHAR(10) NULL,
   JOB_ID VARCHAR(10) NULL,
   SALARY INT NULL,
   COMMISSION_PCT VARCHAR(10) NULL,
   MANAGER_ID INT NULL,
   DEPARTMENT_ID INT NULL
   
)
WITH (
    LOCATION='/dldemofilesystem / MLdata/employees.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE=datasourceADL2,
    FILE_FORMAT=csvFile
);
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM employeeExternalTable2
